Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ compared to \SW-Reviewer Agreed\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that proceed to \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ after \SW-EIC Accept\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of times \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurs after \First Look-Your updates are overdue\
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences out of all activities in the review process
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ as a concluding activity in the manuscript review process
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ followed by \Manuscript Export Succeeded\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ in manuscripts that required major revisions (\SW-EIC Major Revision\) versus minor revisions (\RW-EIC Minor Revision\)
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ in relation to all activities performed by the SYSTEM performer
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Number of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences before \First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation\
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that reach \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ without \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases where 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' does not happen

Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ in manuscripts that exceeded the Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded' occurs

Name: Ratio of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences in manuscripts with \SW-Reviewer No Response\ compared to those with \SW-Reviewer Agreed\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences in the total event log compared to \Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
